name: Castle Wonders - A Castle Tale
description:
Help Willy save a historical castle in this lovely Hidden Object game! Look for Hidden Objects, collect antique relics, play lots of mini games and restore the throne room - all to rescue a once magnificent castle! Renovate the throne room with your hard earned money and restore this broken down castle to its former glories. Make the castle the pride of the kingdom once again!

Features:
- More than 15 different search modes
- Collect rare artifacts and trade for prizes
- Fun, refreshing minigames
- Zoom function and cool hints to help you out
